svg: {{name}}{% for i in range(end=lines + 1) %} {% set offset_x = padding + loop.index0/lines * width %} {% set offset_y = padding + loop.index0/lines * height %}{{ (lines - loop.index0)/lines * y_range + y_min | round(method="ceil", precision=2) }}{{ (loop.index0-lines)/lines * x_range + x_range + x_min | round(method="ceil", precision=2) }}{% if loop.index0 == lines %}{% endif %} {% if loop.index0 == 0 %}{% endif %} {% endfor %} {% for point in path %} {% set x = point.0 %} {% set y = point.1 %}{% endfor %} {% set eig1_x1 = eig_vector1_point1.0 %} {% set eig1_y1 = eig_vector1_point1.1 %} {% set eig1_x2 = eig_vector1_point2.0 %} {% set eig1_y2 = eig_vector1_point2.1 %} {% set eig2_x1 = eig_vector2_point1.0 %} {% set eig2_y1 = eig_vector2_point1.1 %} {% set eig2_x2 = eig_vector2_point2.0 %} {% set eig2_y2 = eig_vector2_point2.1 %}
